item.title: A glimpse of groundwater modeling course
item.description: This course is designed to give student an insight into groundwater modeling. Student are asked to investigate the potential groundwater contaminants at the landfill site of Skrubba, Stockholm. Skrubba is located south-east of Stockholm, here is a map of the area. {"x":{"options":{"crs":{"crsClass":"L.CRS.EPSG3857","code":null,"proj4def":null,"projectedBounds":null,"options":{}}},"setView":[[59.246468,18.195244],13,[]],"calls":[{"method":"addTiles","args":["//{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png",null,null,{"minZoom":0,"maxZoom":18,"tileSize":256,"subdomains":"abc","errorTileUrl":"","tms":false,"noWrap":false,"zoomOffset":0,"zoomReverse":false,"opacity":1,"zIndex":1,"detectRetina":false,"attribution":"© OpenStreetMap contributors, CC-BY-SA"}]},{"method":"addMarkers","args":[59.246468,18.195244,null,null,null,{"interactive":true,"draggable":false,"keyboard":true,"title":"","alt":"","zIndexOffset":0,"opacity":1,"riseOnHover":false,"riseOffset":250},"Skrubba Landfill",null,null,null,null,{"interactive":false,"permanent":false,"direction":"auto","opacity":1,"offset":[0,0],"textsize":"10px","textOnly":false,"className":"","sticky":true},null]}],"limits":{"lat":[59.246468,59.246468],"lng":[18.195244,18.195244]}},"evals":[],"jsHooks":[]} Students job is to model the groundwater flow direction and estimate the travel times of contaminant to the lake Drevviken using ModelMuse.
